title: Rachel McAdams lets her long curly blonde hair down while picking up groceries at market in LA
text:
Rachel McAdams looked casually glamorous as she let her long curly blonde hair down Monday while grocery shopping in Los Angeles.

The 40-year-old actress donned a long white, grey and black dress while picking up groceries at a health food store.

Rachel completed her outfit with white sneakers and accessorized with sunglasses.

Market trip: Rachel McAdams carried a fresh juice drink Monday after picking up groceries at a natural foods market in Los Angeles

She added a pop of color with red lipstick and also carried a crimson purse.

Rachel left the natural foods market carrying a fresh red juice drink.

The environmentalist also left the market holding a pair of reusable bags.

The Canada native was spotted last month in Scotland filming her upcoming movie Eurovision.

Reusable bags: The 40-year-old environmentalist left the market carrying reusable bags

The comedy also stars Will Ferrell, 52, and follows Icelandic singers Lars Erickssong and Sigrit Ericksdottir as they are given the chance to represent their country at the Eurovision Song Contest.

Eurovision also features Pierce Brosnan, Dan Stevens and Demi Lovato.

The movie is expected to be released next year on Netflix.

Family outing: Rachel is shown with her boyfriend Jamie Linden, their infant son and her mother Sandra in September 2018 in Los Angeles

Rachel has been in a relationship since 2016 with writer Jamie Linden, 39.

They welcomed a son in April 2018.

Rachel rose to fame in 2004 with the comedy Mean Girls also starring Lindsay Lohan, 33, and the romantic drama The Notebook.

She was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of reporter Sacha Pfeiffer in the 2015 drama Spotlight.
